reviews.review:
Great game, Replayable, well optomized, amazing art design, intresting concepts, spooky as shit sometimes, and overall a giant mindfuck.

While this game may appear to be friendly and sunny, there is a much darker tone underneath. I highly reccomend this game to anyone looking for a new experience, or fans of similiar games such as Dishonored.

我既不醉心于德威特父女的羁绊，也不惊叹于量子力学的迷幻。

山巅之城的梦被玷污了，我们就去建立云端之城。

这座城不叫阿美利加，其名哥伦比亚。

免得伤膝河的子孙遍地，在世上修满城邑；

不可与拳匪的后人结亲，也不可与他们立约。

希望人们都能有 

华盛顿的勇气 

富兰克林的智慧

杰斐逊的公正

能够肩负起昭昭天命

步伐自海直至光辉之海

愿盐与光长存人间。

记得升级武器伤害！！！！！！
画面很好，不是很精细，但有很好的艺术感，初到哥伦比亚真的是被惊到了。
大概是唯一玩过的在战斗中还能感受到NPC存在的游戏。
战斗很混乱，战斗BGM还就一个。
导航标识老是叫你去空轨上，然而去了空轨上滑行太快，根本看不清下一个导航标识。
剧情看不懂
UN JUEGAZO 100% RECOMENDABLE: Tiene una banda sonora increible, jugabilidad estupenda y una historia que te va a tener enganchado todo el día. 9/10.
일단 사세요.
Bioshock Infinite is one of those games that leaves you stunned with the visual, sound and storytelling. It leaves you with questions of your own infinite choices. Buy this, now.

I bought all three of the Bioshocks on a bundled sale.

Waste of time.  The gameplay never improved from the first to last and neither did the basic concept.  Opposition faction is always...easy to hate.  Didn't bother playing the second one. 

Compared to other SP titles...the story just didn't pay off.  Looks pretty but the gameplay is just lacking.
JOGO PICA
A man sets out to find and kill Santa Claus, but he was Santa Claus all along.
Tres bon jeu, même si j'ai pas eu le coeur a le finir :/

BioShock Infinite - это завораживающая, волнующая, крайне атмосферная, непредсказуемая, местами трогательная и одновременно переворачивающая ваши мысли с ног на голову игра, которая по части механики шутеров далеко не самая лучшая, но очень живая, не без заслуги главной протагонистки Элизабет, похитившей множество сердец игроков. Пожалуйста, сыграйте в неё, потому что игра вряд ли оставит вас равнодушным.

Отдельно стоит внести слово про любительскую локализацию от CGInfo: это одна из лучших локализаций в принципе за всё существование игр. Идеально подобранны голоса, отыгранны эмоции и переведенны текстуры (99% всего контента в игре).
神一般的劇情搭配優秀的遊戲性，不玩可惜
foda foda foda muito foda

2013년에 만들어진거 맞냐?거의 5년이 지났는데 최신출시했다고 해도 손색없는 그래픽 갓겜이라 할만하다.

스토리도 좋고, 사운도 아주마음에 드는 그런게임이었다.

불편한거라면, 탄알집정도?

별점은 4개반?
Oyun için söylenecek tek bir şey var : Şahane.
I really can't recommend this on PC. Major stuttering on a high end rig, tried all the tips such as altering the poolsize for textures and reducing settings but it's fairly unplayable. Such a shame.
Очень интересная игра, ни один раз прошёл её, и каждый раз чему-то удивляюсь) Отличный сюжет, всё это здесь сделано по вышке. После этой игры начали нравиться игры жанра Стимпанк, и спасибо ей))

Holy Hell what a game. This has the best story i have ever seen in a video game, or movie even. PLAY TO THE END. Its worth it. The vigors are are fun aspect to a FPS game. All around one of the best games i have ever played, though i can only say to play through it once.

Gráficos lindos!
Lutas envolventes!
No entanto achei os inimigos sem graça quando comparados aos inimigos dos dois primeiros jogos...
Recomendo!
Muy bueno
스토리가 탄탄하고 활력 바꾸면서 싸우는 재미가 있다 그래픽도 완벽 스토리도 완벽하다 엘리자베스는 진짜 아름답다

Que decir de este clímax de la saga... Increíble juego. Una estetica y apartado artístico precioso y muy bien ambientado, una jugabilidad buena y entretenida (La de todos los shooters xD) y una historia... De las que te dejan sin poder dormir. Recomendadisimo para todos si habeis jugado los anteriores.

玩了这个游戏之后我才知道。。。。队友靠谱是有多好
表白伊丽莎白
话说，最近玩的这些质量很高的游戏都是悲剧结局。。。有没有人推荐一款游戏有好玩结局也比较暖的，不想再被虐了
It's fun, but the gameplay gets pretty stale around the third act.

In my opinion, this is one of the best fps of the last 20 years, if not ever!

First: the graghics are just beautiful and support the atmosphere just perfect!

Second: the atmosphete is great! You start in a beautiful city in the sky and you see it falling down during the playthrough.

Third: the gameplay is pretty basic weaponwise, but the skyhook, the skylines and the vigors add some verry fun elements to it. So do the tears, elisabeth can bring into the world. And with elisabeth comes the two biggest reasons into play, that makes this game a masterpiece and a milestone in gaming history!

Fourth: Elisabeth! One of the, if not the best "sidekick" in a game ever!!
She is never in the way, she doesn't need to be protected, she provides ammo, healh salts during fights and finds money when not in a fight. She can open tears, moves the story forward and her body language / facial expressions are nearly perfect! And she interacts with her surrounding.

Fifth: the story! One of the most intelligent and complex ever done in a fps! Not easy to follow, if you don't listen to all the voxaphones in the game, don't listen to the dialogs or pay not much attention in general. But if you do (a second playthrough is recommendet to understand all the little details) everything makes sense, and the end will leave you with an open mouth and days and days you will think about the story and want to tell everyone you know, what you think about it!

The only negative things i could point out (and they are not really to mention, couse they don't affect the gameplay in a big way imo) are, that you can only carry two weapons, there are some minor grahic bugs and the npcs (beside elisabeth oc!) all look the same and only have one phrase to speak.

In the end, this is a masterpiece in storytelling, atmosphere and a milestone in gaming history! 
Buy it! Play it! Enjoy it! It will be a long time, till something nearly equal good comes out! 

Highly recommended! 10/10

如果你能毫不费力地看懂姜文近几部作品的历史比喻，而且对美国等资本主义国家的政治历史文化有一定的理解的话，那么这款游戏可能你才会玩懂。
真的这是我唯一一款脑子跟不上剧情的游戏，即使我二周目了。

they put so much weird stuff into this and then they desperately try to explain it, it feels like a fan au of the first two games. gameplay is kinda fun but dont try to understand 100% of the story you will loose your mind.

Lo compre con season pass en una rebaja hace un par de meses a casi nada

Solo una palabra INCREIBLE lo mejor que he jugado en un buen tiempo historia, jugabilidad, doblaje y musica genial.

Lo unico que no me gusto fue la poca variedad de enemigos de resto increible .

Lejos recomendado y deberias jugar el bioshock 1 ,el 2 ....es descartable pero recomiendo el 1.

尽管我知道这一切都徒劳无功，尽管这一切都没有尽头，尽管我们的过往只是潘洛斯阶梯的普通一阶，尽管结局是那样的熟悉而陌生，可是那又怎样？我依然愿意再一次与你相识，我亲爱的伊丽莎白！

久闻大名趁打折高质量加一 唯美的蒸汽朋克风一开始就吸引了我 连贯而引人入胜的剧情 并不丰富但却诚意十足的武器系统与技能系统给游戏增添了许多乐趣

玩完之后感觉蛮失落的 这世界上又少了一高质量游戏让我玩

DLC很早就买了 不过因为各种原因迟迟没能玩上 打算找个安静的夏日午后 泡杯冰茶 舒舒服服的打完

Doporučuji na pul. Celou hru tahne jen jeden charakter a to Liz. Budiž. Zbytek byl blast který mi zas tak k srdci nepřirostl. Rozuzlení mě vyloženě zklamalo i když sem ho tušil. Ve skrytu jsem si asi přál nějakou muchlovačku ... tipuju že každej z hráčů tehle hry. Smůla. Na jedno zahrání určitě doporučuju.

Pretty fun game and great mechincs. I really loved the skyline riding. The issue I have is that i feel so mcuh is missing. Anyhow not bad of a game and wouldn't say its bad. Great boss fights and great story and plot twist. Overall I give this game 6/10 just to be generous.

∞/10 would play again. Then get another version of me to play again. Then play an infinite amount of times with infinite possibilities. As long as it is me playing this game, those are the constants. There is always a game, and always a player.

шёл 2017 год. я впервые сел за биошок. первые 2 части мне не особо зашли(особенно вторая) и я решил сыграть в инфинайт по совету друзей. игра очень понравилась, т.к. люблю тематику временных парадоксов. рекомендую. 9 шок-жокеев из 10

i really believe this game is so over-hyped, not saying its a bad game but really it doesnt deserve all the praise its getting, thats a 7/10 game imho not a 9.5/10 one

my comments:
- story is deep and well written and voice acting is top notch but its not every one cup of tea, at least not mine, story didnt interest me one bit so i ended up giving up on going forward, again its not bad but like in music some like house music some like rap/r&b so u get the point . . .
- art style, as above, art style is high quality and well made but not my or everyones taste, too cartoonish to my liking
- gameplay and mechanics so stripped down and so simply to the degee that its really boring, little skill involved and and no good difficulty option, its either too easy or too frustrating; good difficulty is a good challenge which is not there;  again this is due to the simple mechanics, its feels like an interactive story more than a game which is not what i came for!
- last but most important is the thing called "STUTTER" it stutters like hell and no solution ever helped! btw im gaming on a 4.4ghz 5930k and a 1080Ti so . . . !

well, if u enjoy it good for u, its not a bad game but its not everyone cup of tea, if u didnt buy it yet then watch some youtube videos and read unbiased reviews well before u do, dont just blindly auto buy it cz of an FPS with overwhelmingly positve reviews (its not a real fps trust me) like i did and end up bored and dissapointed.

这部生化奇兵是我玩过的最好玩的，整体的感觉也很有蒸汽朋克的style，Arkane也算是除了耻辱系列之外生化奇兵这个系列给我感觉最好的一款游戏，无论是建筑风格还是技能等等等等，都是很有Arkane个人风格的，我很喜欢这种风格，而且就游戏本身来说这部游戏很耐玩，无脑突突突也行，喜欢搜犄角旮旯捡破烂的也行，总之耐玩程度可以给个七八分的样子，游戏整体可以给到八分上下浮动的样子，总之可以在绿BUFF的时候买买买一波。

Oyun paralel evrenler teorisinden çok yürüyor ve diğer oyunlardan bağımsız bir oyun.Genelde insanların şikayetide bu yüzden olmuş.Artık yeni bir dünyadayız artık denizin altında ki karanlık atmosferde değil gökyüzünde daha püfür püfür güneşli bir atmosferdeyiz.

Artılar
-Harika bir senaryo
-Oynanış mekanikleri önce ki 2 oyuna göre daha çok haz veriyor
-Demirlerden kayma olayı ayrı bir zevkli
-Silah çeşitliliği 

Eksileri
-Diğer oyunlar gibi gerilim pek yok
-İnsan ister istemez rapture'u özlüyor

[h1] 借我一座灯塔吧	[/h1]

【剧透预警！】【剧透预警！】

[u] “布克，你在乎上帝吗？”[/u]
[u] “我在乎的是你。”	[/u]

我知道，穷尽一生，我的罪恶也不能被洗净。

在另一座灯塔，在另一个世界，在另一片天空下，有苍老的你，有对纽约降下烈火的你，有挣扎在高塔中的你；我是奉行沙文主义的康斯托克先知，我是奋勇而起的人民党烈士布克·德维特，我是不敢救回你的那个懦夫，我是走向先知之手的父亲。

我有着无数纷繁的世界，我在不同的世界体验不同的人生。

但是，在这些世界，你都不快乐。

有没有一个世界，你的手指是完整的，你的面容是带笑的？

借我这样一座灯塔吧。当我走进灯塔，素衣便服的你对我招招手，接着安定地看着潮汐涌落。

毕竟，你才是我的洗礼。
지금까지도 앞으로도 없을 인생겜 라오어보다도 훨신재밋었음
大家好，这是我女朋友@伊丽莎白

Уже всеми любимая и всеми пройденная Bioshock infinite не нуждается в каких либо комментариях или обзорах, все и так знают эту игру не хуже других. Но все же я хотел бы поделиться своим мнением (никому не нужным) на эту игру.
Игра начинается с того, что главный герой в сопровождении двух [spoiler] чудиков-изобретателей [/spoiler]. Мы как и в первой части Bioshock заходим на маяк, откуда улетает в Колумбию - город в воздухе, где и происходит весь сюжет.
[h1] Что понравилось [/h1]
•Сюжет.
•Атмосфера
•Красиво выполненные локации
•Харизматичные герои
•Хорошо прораработанный тир
•Cаундтрек
•Элизабет
[h1] Что не понравилось [/h1]
•Стрельба во врагов успевает надоедать
•[u] Игра заканчивается [/u]

这是我少数能够沉下心来持续游玩通关的游戏之一了，战斗跟前作比感觉并没有出彩很多，不过最终的战斗印象还是挺深刻的。但伊丽莎白这个角色真的太棒了，能够一口气打完很大程度是因为她。唯美的画面让人眼前一亮，音效感觉很好，结局表现力强，故事未必非常严谨但深度是有的，游戏本体结局后，我表面波澜不惊，内心却错愕不已。有空余时间就马上玩了dlc，dlc为整个系列做了联结，画上了完整的句号，每次感受完这样充满诚意和想法的作品都让人心神恍惚迷离，震撼之余有隐隐的失落与惆怅。
ОЧ КЛАССНАЯ!
der wikliche zweite teil von bioshok ...auch die DLCs sind sehr gut 9/10
重复性太多了，一直哒哒哒。。。上了轨道就迷路，烦
One of my favorite games of all time

Grande é esse jogo, sua jogabilidade e árvore de skills podem não ser originais ou criativas, mas sua história, criatividade é o que não falta e é das melhores que já presencie em um jogo.
O mundo é muito bem construído e imersivo, a trilha sonora ajuda e muito nesta imersão, porém a música é tão bem utilizada que ela se torna um personagem no game de tão imponente que a mesma é, design de cenários é lindíssimo e a sintonia entre os dois personagens principais é magistral.
La perfección hecha juego. Nada más que añadir.
A fun game to play! I would definitely recommend it to my friends!

剧情上的优秀就不谈了。

[spoiler]伊丽莎白我[strike]老婆！[/strike]女儿！[/spoiler]

游戏颇具心裁地设计了伊丽莎白这样一个伙伴角色，几乎全程陪伴玩家，大大提高了玩家的游玩体验。战斗时，伊丽莎白的支援让玩家感觉自己不是一个人战斗，不直接参与战斗的设计也保证了玩家的战斗爽快感不会打折扣，始终如一。不战斗时，伊丽莎白充分散发着一个女主角应有的魅力，让玩家的探索过程不至于太沉闷，同时在某些比较阴森恐怖的场景，伊丽莎白的存在也十分关键地缓解了玩家的紧张感。
伊丽莎白的角色设计真的非常出色，脱离了以往游戏中npc在对话中展现的单薄形象，真正做到了“伙伴”这样一个角色应有的功能，使玩家产生一种依赖感。这种依赖感直接影响到了玩家在关键章节失去她时产生的情绪，调动了玩家内在的能动性。很大程度上，这游戏的代入感都是靠伊丽莎白来提供的，剧情上的一波三折几乎都与伊丽莎白息息相关，一场游戏下来玩家就像是谈了一场短暂的恋爱。出色的游戏往往不会只有一个优秀的剧情，制作人显然非常懂得代入感之于剧情的重要性。

不过除此之外的战斗系统，其实是有相——当大的潜力可以挖掘的，而目前的表现，只能说是中规中矩。各个技能，套装等等作用上看似丰富多样，但是实际上却无法真正影响到玩家的战斗方式，只是换种视觉上的方式吊打敌人而已，技能之间缺乏必要的combo，用与不用都几乎不会太大地影响玩家的战斗过程。如果不针对这些技能设计一些有意思的敌人和关卡，那么这些东西的存在就只是鸡肋而已。不过考虑上制作过程几经重制，多次切削之后还能保证游戏性上的连贯，已属不易。

could not get it to run very well, had to reboot the game every hour or so due to stutter accumulating.

BUT CRAP IT WAS GOOD
사

终于通关了，国庆闲着，想找一个有妹子的游戏，于是就迷迷糊糊的买了98快的本体，玩过之后，感觉回味无穷。真的像是谈一场恋爱，在海边跳舞，在集市上买徽章，那些美好的时光永远都铭记在心里，啊，对了棉花糖的还要补全一下。
结局走进最后的那扇门之前,伊丽莎白问我，“你真的确定吗？”那一刻，我真的好像说，我选择哪里也不去，我们就在这里，一起，看这些灯塔。可是并没有这样的选项。伊丽莎白，要知道你为了拯救世界，最后自己也会消失，难道真的生活的痛苦还敌不过永恒消失的寂寞吗？
最近失去了另一半，谢谢伊丽莎白，陪我度过这段难熬的时光。不论如何，这款游戏对于我人生的意义，或许大过它本想告诉我的那些东西吧。以后再玩起来还是会想到这些日子，记得自己怎么熬过去，要珍惜幸福。E妹一生推

I just finished the game and I have never in my life been this shocked by a game. I sat there staring at the screen for 10 minutes, no feelings, no thoughts, just shock. The gameplay is alright, not the best ever, but the story is a gem. This wasn't just a game, this was an art piece, a chef-d'oeuvre. Truly a work of a genius and I must say this is a game that changed my life and my perception of life and the universe. If you haven't played this yet, you MUST play it.
짧게 즐겻지만 무척이나 여운이 남앗고 무엇보다 '재미'가 있엇다'균열'이라는 개체때문에 어렴풋이 예상은 했지만 예상을 뛰어넘는 스토리와 결말에 감탄을 금치 못했다. 세일할때 샀지만 정말 스토리만큼은 이렇게 충격과 여운이 남는 게임은 위쳐3 이후로 처음인것같다.
神作。慕名已久的我因为一丝强迫症从1代开始玩，感受到了12代一路打BOSS的快感和恰到好处的压抑气氛。到了3代从界面开始就感受到了不一样的明媚风格。123代每一代都给了我不一样的震撼，厉害至极。
Nice

bug多，关卡指示不清，有几率闪退，射击感游戏性很差，2k的steam版优化很糟糕。
有人说优点是游戏画面好，剧情好，女主好，那我为什么要玩电脑而不是去找部高分电影看呢？
神作，第一次玩通的时候被震撼，有生之年必玩系列，第一次让我领路第九艺术这四个字的魅力所在
满分不谢

[h1] BIOSHOCK INFINITE REVIEW [/h1]

I'm not even sure where to start a review on this game. I've played countless amount of games in my lifetime, some that have given me very fond, happy memories. Some have given me grief, or regret, and some have made me feel... Sad, Attached.. Inspired. This is one of those few games that have made me feel this way.

I can honestly say that I fell in love with this game from the first part. I won't spoil it but, the first area after the lighthouse? Oh it's beautiful. I think I just stood there and walked around listening to that song, looking at the scenery as it played. I got really attached at that point. 

The story, to me, is like.. when you want to play a game and you want it to have a really good story, and something that makes sense and seems worth your time. That's definitely this story. I could go on and on about how fantastic this game is, but I think if you're on the edge of purchasing it, then definitely do so. It could honestly change your life. I know it has for me. 

It seems a bit silly, as this is just a game to some, but I believe that games are a form of artwork, and with artwork, you can produce certain feelings and messages to give to the receivers. 

This is my favorite game of all time, and it will always be forever now. It holds a very special place in my heart... I'll never forget it.

Story: 11/10 (Seriously, it's breathtaking)

Graphics: 10/10 (I'm a sucker for the art-style, heh)

Audio: 8/10 (Sometimes, very very very rarely the audio would mess up and sound like it was underwater or something. 
Pretty sure that's on my end though, as it happened with another game too)

Gameplay: 8/10 (The combat is quite fun, it's very different from what you may be used to, it's like.. crisp. If that makes sense.)

[h1] Wholeheartedly recommend this game. :) [/h1]

Jogo com estilo diferente e interessante. Jogabilidade muito divertida e história intrigante. 
História - 8
Jogabilidade - 9
Gráficos - 8
Som - 9
Diversão - 8

虽然不建议一周目的时候过分专注于收集，但是游戏的很多背景剧情都在收集里，所以就很尴尬。。。
Bu oyun hakkında söylenecek tek şey MÜKEMMEL...

Infinite is definitely an interesting game that is worth the journey, but only because of the lustre established by its ending third and the plot-twists therein. Sadly, the story is heavily segregated from the gameplay - so you end up in the situation where your main character, someone remorseful about killing, spends most of the game committing manslaughter. 

Sadly, the high-octane action gameplay within is also rather bland and at best functional. And once the afterglow of the story fades away, you realise you're left with a game with bad gameplay and an ultimately flawed storyline which serves as filler till the ending.
Zarąbista gra!!!
